about_the_game:
Hellrooms is a 4 player, online co-op, psychological horror game. Enter our backrooms universe alone or with your friends, and traverse this liminal and terrifying realm. Outsmart all manners of entities, solve puzzles, find secrets, immerse yourselves in the lore, and find the exit! With a variety of levels to choose from, and more coming in future updates, the adventures and explorations are near endless!

  • Realistic Graphics & Atmosphere: Dive into unsettling yet calming liminal spaces crafted with realistic graphics, an expertly designed user interface, and intuitive controls. Every hallway, room, and shadow is meticulously designed to pull you deeper into the unknown.

  • Terrifying Entities: Face off against a variety of horrifying entities that will test your nerves and ingenuity. From classic backrooms creatures to our own nightmarish creations, you'll need to escape, hide, and outsmart them at every turn.

  • Entities Hear You: Stay whisper-quiet if you want to survive. Our advanced AI allows some entities to hear your microphone input—one loud noise could be the difference between life and untimely doom.

  • Cooperative Play: Team up with up to 4 friends and navigate through procedurally generated and intricately designed static levels. Collaboration is key to solving puzzles, overcoming obstacles, and making it out alive.

  • Communication Systems: Utilize proximity voice chat, whistling, and more to effectively coordinate with your team. Strategize on the fly and keep your communications sharp—every whisper counts when danger lurks around every corner.

  • Unique Mechanics & Puzzles: Immerse yourself in unique gameplay mechanics like our underwater swimming system. Tackle a variety of puzzles that range in difficulty, ensuring that every play session offers new challenges and surprises.

  • Procedurally Generated Levels: No two runs are the same with our procedurally generated levels. Explore ever-changing environments that keep you guessing and constantly adapting your strategies.

  • Permanent Progression Systems: Build your character with permanent progression systems, including levels, skills, and gear upgrades. Customize your playstyle and become a master of the backrooms.

  • Speedrunning Potential: Perfect for speedrunners, our game offers the ideal systems to test your skills and push the limits. Race against time in the enigmatic backrooms universe and set new records.

  • Iconic and Original Levels: Play through popular, well-known backrooms levels and our own passionately crafted liminal spaces. Each level is designed with care to provide a unique and immersive experience.

content_descriptors.notes: As a horror game, Hellrooms contains a variety of entities that hunt players down to try and stop them from reaching the end of the level. Hellrooms contains a fair bit of psychological horror as well, in terms of ambience, story telling, traditional jump-scares, as well as strategic use of horror tension and lighting.

  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650
  • DirectX: Version 11
